train_data <- read_csv(
  "train.csv",
  col_types = cols(
    obs = col_double(),
    citizen = col_logical(),
    age = col_double(),
    treatment = col_double(),
    attitude = col_double()
  )

train_data %>%
  mutate(treatment = factor(treatment)) %>%
  specify(attitude ~ treatment) %>%
  hypothesize(null = "independence") %>%
  generate(reps = 1000, type = "permute") %>%
  calculate(stat = "diff in medians", order = c("1", "0"))
